basics.name: Tongze Mao
basics.label: Mobile App Developer & Full-Stack Engineer (HCI & AI)
basics.summary: A dedicated and creative full-stack developer specializing in mobile app development, human-computer interaction, and intelligent systems. Graduated CUM LAUDE from UC Irvine with dual degrees in Computer Science and Informatics, plus a minor in Statistics. Skilled in Swift, React, Flutter, Python, and more. Seeking to build innovative solutions that empower users and solve real-world problems.

work.name: SupTech
work.summary: Led a two-person dev team to create two separate production-ready apps (each for iOS & Android) in three months using Flutter, Firebase, JavaScript, and MySQL. Integrated with partner APIs (e.g. Roborock, EcoFlow, dreame, jackery) and managed the entire development cycle, from coding and testing to deployment.
highlights: Developed two full-stack mobile apps (iOS & Android) from scratch using Flutter and Firebase.
Implemented back-end integrations in MySQL + JavaScript and set up robust CI/CD pipelines.
Collaborated with multiple partner APIs (Roborock, EcoFlow, dreame, jackery) for seamless data flow.
Acted as both hands-on coder and project manager: built features, oversaw Agile sprints, conducted code reviews, and created user documentation.

work.name: HD EDUCATION
work.summary: Instructed over 160 undergraduate students in advanced calculus topics through 150+ hours of teaching. Promoted to Senior Tutor for consistently high feedback and effective course design.
highlights: Developed comprehensive curriculum on Antiderivatives, Fundamental Theorem of Calculus, and more.
Structured learning paths, hands-on problem sessions, and real-time Q&A channels.
Recognized as Senior Tutor in 2023 for outstanding results and dedication to student success.

volunteer.summary: Founded a daily self-education group that promotes continuous learning and knowledge sharing beyond formal academics. Participants commit to at least 40 minutes of study per day, supported by shared resources and community discussions.
highlights: Fostered an environment of accountability, with members collectively reading over 200 books.
Maintained a centralized progress-tracking platform to measure and celebrate learning milestones.
Grew a diverse network of learners from various backgrounds, emphasizing peer mentorship.

volunteer.summary: Contributed 46 hours in various roles—ticket inspector, attendant, cleaner—to ensure smooth theatrical productions and enhance attendee experiences.
highlights: Handled front-of-house tasks, audience management, and logistical support for multiple shows.
Developed strong interpersonal communication skills while engaging diverse patron demographics.
Strengthened non-profit operations by maintaining event organization and overall venue quality.

volunteer.summary: Participated in a one-day environmental stewardship event, planting trees and cleaning communal spaces.
highlights: Learned ecological best practices for urban forestry and water conservation.
Collaborated closely with local community members to maximize volunteer impact.

education.summary: Dean’s Honor List for 9 quarters, recognized for exceptional academic achievement in dual majors (Computer Science & Informatics).

education.institution: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
courses: EndoNeRF - Pose-Free Depth-Supervised Neural Radiance Fields
education.summary: Focused on medical 3D reconstruction for endoscopic procedures, collaborating on advanced NeRF-based solutions.
Class of 2020 Salutatorian, recognized for exemplary academic performance and leadership.

awards.title: UCI CUM LAUDE
awards.summary: Conferred upon graduating with outstanding academic performance (3.934 GPA).

awards.title: Dean’s Honor List (9 Quarters)
awards.summary: Recognized for high academic standing over multiple quarters in dual B.S. programs.

awards.title: Arcadia High School Salutatorian
awards.summary: Graduated second in class with a 3.97 GPA; honored for consistent academic excellence.

awards.title: Future Art China International Competition
awards.summary: Ranked in top 100 out of 10,000 paintings; exhibited at Lincoln Center in NYC.

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming I
certificates.summary: Introduced core programming methodologies, language fundamentals, and best practices for ethical computing.

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming II Java
certificates.summary: Covered advanced OOP concepts, searching/sorting algorithms, and design using Unified Modeling Language (UML).

certificates.name: Career Skills Certificate: Computer Programming IB Java
certificates.summary: Highest-level certificate, emphasizing real-world collaboration, object-oriented programming, and arrays/sequential files.

interests.name: Digital Illustration & Sticker Design
keywords: Designed sticker sets (crocodile, fuzzy monster) with 10k+ sends
Exploring new forms of creative expression

interests.name: Writing & Literature
keywords: Daily practice in classical Chinese writing
4th place in classical Chinese writing contest

projects.name: DoneTodo
projects.summary: A minimalist time-planning app enabling intuitive drag-and-drop scheduling, real-time color-coded timelines, and detailed analytics of daily/weekly/monthly usage.
highlights: Swift-based iOS development with a focus on lightweight UI/UX design.
Implemented statistical insights for user time distribution and behavior patterns.
Reduces cognitive overload by limiting features to essential productivity flows.

projects.name: HowDidI — Paid Résumé-Sharing Platform (iOS)
projects.summary: An iOS application allowing users to upload and monetize their résumés, while readers purchase passes to access curated, first-hand career application materials.
highlights: Served as PM & tech lead for a 3-person university team, using Swift + Firebase for real-time data storage.
Coordinated Agile sprints, requirement breakdown, and progress demos to stakeholders.
Mentored junior developers on end-to-end app creation (UI design, back-end integration, testing).

projects.name: WriterCards
projects.summary: An iOS app dedicated to daily writing prompts for creativity and self-reflection, developed independently using Swift.
highlights: Employed project management to prevent scope creep (tracked tasks via Jira & GitHub).
Handled all stages—design, coding, and QA—single-handedly.
Facilitated user-driven journaling experiences for personal growth.

projects.name: Goshsha App – Future AR Interactive Shopping
projects.summary: Revamped an AR-based shopping prototype to attract Gen Z users by focusing on UI/UX improvements and cross-platform performance.
highlights: Employed React Expo for iOS & Android compatibility.
Conducted weekly stakeholder sessions, refining design based on direct feedback.
Enhanced database performance and front-end responsiveness while de-emphasizing heavy AR components.

projects.name: LifeTune
projects.summary: Health-tracking app offering simplified data visuals and motivational insights to help users avoid data overload.
highlights: Collaborated on user research, wireframing, and prototype testing.
Developed a user-centric dashboard displaying diet, exercise, and sleep patterns.
Adopted iterative design methods to continually refine core features.

projects.name: MyWellness (iOS)
projects.summary: Built an iOS application that collects and analyzes user health metrics, delivering personalized feedback.
highlights: Swift-based mobile development with integrated visualization for physical activities.
Introduced a recommendation engine for curated health suggestions.
Created brand visuals (logo, color palette) to establish identity.

projects.name: Canvas for Neurodivergent Students
projects.summary: Enhanced LMS (Canvas) accessibility through Dark Mode, Text-to-Speech, and improved user flow tailored to neurodivergent needs.
highlights: Conducted interviews to uncover core accessibility pain points.
Developed wireframes and prototypes for inclusive UI/UX features.
Demonstrated improved usability in user testing with diverse student profiles.

projects.name: Spotify Browser (Web)
projects.summary: A high-performance web application mimicking core Spotify functionalities with Angular, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
highlights: Implemented OAuth-based authentication and real-time Spotify API data retrieval.
Utilized lazy loading and caching to optimize page load times.
Supported multi-user logins with robust session management.

projects.name: CheckersAI
projects.summary: Collaborative AI agent for a classic Checkers game under UCI's COMPSCI 171 (Intro to AI).
highlights: Engineered search algorithms to dynamically adapt to various board states.
Incorporated heuristics and alpha-beta pruning for strategic gameplay.

projects.name: Cancer Observer
projects.summary: A user-centric application recommending cancer screenings based on personal health data, leveraging WordPress for rapid prototyping.
highlights: Established brand identity and coded the web interface.
Implemented reminders to encourage consistent screening habits.
Demonstrated expertise in UI/UX design for preventive healthcare solutions.
